mapper.sql: ID, DPRTCODE, WHBMID, WHRID, WHSJ, SHLX, SHDH, SHBMID, SHRID, SHRQ, LYDW, BZ, ZT, LYID, LYBH, LYMC
mapper.insert: insert into B_H2_020 (ID, DPRTCODE, WHBMID, WHRID, WHSJ, SHLX, SHDH, SHBMID, SHRID, SHRQ, LYDW, BZ, ZT, LYID, LYBH, LYMC) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lydw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

ID,
DPRTCODE,

mapper.update:
update B_H2_020
DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHBMID = #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SHLX = #{shlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SHDH = #{shdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHBMID = #{shbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHRID = #{shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHRQ = #{shrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LYDW = #{lydw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LYID = #{lyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LYBH = #{lybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LYMC = #{lymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update B_H2_020 set DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHBMID = #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SHLX = #{shlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SHDH = #{shdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHBMID = #{shbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHRID = #{shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHRQ = #{shrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LYDW = #{lydw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LYID = #{lyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LYBH = #{lybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LYMC = #{lymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update B_H2_020
WHBMID = #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SHLX = #{shlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SHBMID = #{shbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHRID = #{shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHRQ = #{shrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LYDW = #{lydw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LYID = #{lyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LYBH = #{lybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LYMC = #{lymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select b1.id, b1.dprtcode, b1.shlx, b1.shdh, b1.shbmid, b1.shrid, b1.shrq, b1.lydw, b1.bz, b1.zt, b1.lyid, b1.lybh, b1.lymc, b2.id as detail_id, b2.bjid as detail_bjid, b2.bjh as detail_bjh, b2.pch as detail_pch, b2.sn as detail_sn, b2.sl as detail_sl, b2.dw as detail_dw, b2.is_zj as detail_is_zj, b2.cqid as detail_cqid, b2.lsckid as detail_lsckid, b2.lskwid as detail_lskwid, b2.lscfwz as detail_lscfwz, b2.wckcllid as detail_wckcllid, d1.hclx as detail_hclx, case when d1.ywms is not null then d1.ywms||' '||d1.zwms else null end as detail_bjmc, d2.cqbh as detail_cqbh, b4.lylx as detail_lymxlx, b4.lymxid as detail_lymxid, b3.id as shelf_id, b3.mainid as shelf_mainid, b3.cklb as shelf_cklb, b3.ckid as shelf_ckid, b3.ckh as shelf_ckh, b3.ckmc as shelf_ckmc, b3.kwid as shelf_kwid, b3.kwh as shelf_kwh, b3.sjsl as shelf_sjsl, b3.jldw as shelf_jldw, b3.kccb as shelf_kccb, b3.biz as shelf_biz, b3.jz as shelf_jz, b3.jzbz as shelf_jzbz, shr.id as shrid, shr.username as shrusername, shr.realname as shrrealname from B_H2_020 b1 left join B_H2_02001 b2 on b1.id = b2.mainid left join B_H2_0200101 b3 on b2.id = b3.mainid left join t_user shr on b1.shrid = shr.id left join d_008 d1 on b2.bjh = d1.bjh and b1.dprtcode = d1.dprtcode and d1.zt = 1 left join d_026 d2 on b2.cqid = d2.id left join b_h_027 b4 on b2.id = b4.shmxid where b1.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from B_H2_020 where shrid = #{shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and zt in (1, 2)
AND shlx = #{shlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
AND shrq >= TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{paramsMap.shrqBegin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
AND shrq <= TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{paramsMap.shrqEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
AND (lower(shdh) LIKE lower('%'||#{paramsMap.keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%') OR lower(lydw) LIKE lower('%'||#{paramsMap.keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%') OR lower(lybh) LIKE lower('%'||#{paramsMap.keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%') )
order by shdh
